channel.title: Help Getting My Server Up!
channel.description:
I tried following the tut -http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36663.0.html I Did The Testscape source And i did everything it told me to do but when i got to step six and i tried to log in to my internal ip 127.0.0.1 i couldnt log on to it and if you can explain to me what an internal ip is :P sry im just really new to this and really want to learn
Edit Compile.bat and replace the text inside it with:
Code: @echo off title yourservernamehere "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe" server pause Edit Runserver.bat and replace the text inside it with:
Code: @echo off title yourservernamehere java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
And also where its says title yourservername here do you put your server name or just leave it the way it is?

item.title: Help Getting My Server Up!

item.description:
@thug4life wrote:

hey i dont have msn but can we just talk on this topic? or do you have aim?[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 01:26:05 PM[/size][hr]… lol? come on help me please …[br][size=1]Posted at: November 24, 2006, 01:26:33 PM[/size][hr]No but pko i have the version 1.5.0_09 cause the tut told me to downland that version

item.title: Help Getting My Server Up!
item.dc:creator: @pko pko
item.description:
@pko wrote:

@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause

This, but just put in your version of java. where it says jdk1.5.0_09, change it to whatever version you have. you should have 06-09

Read full topic

item.title: Help Getting My Server Up!
item.dc:creator: @thug4life thug4life
item.description:
@thug4life wrote:

I tried following the tut -http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,36663.0.html
I Did The Testscape source
And i did everything it told me to do
but when i got to step six and i tried to log in to my internal ip 127.0.0.1
i couldnt log on to it
and if you can explain to me what an internal ip is sry im just really new to this and really want to learn

Edit Compile.bat and replace the text inside it with:

Code:
@echo off
title yourservernamehere
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\java.exe” server
pause
Edit Runserver.bat and replace the text inside it with:

Code:
@echo off
title yourservernamehere
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

And also where its says title yourservername here do you put your server name or just leave it the way it is?

Read full topic
